profile.name: Rahul Bedjavalge
profile.title: Machine Learning Engineer & AI/ML Researcher
profile.summary: AI/ML researcher and engineer currently pursuing Master's in Artificial Intelligence. Experienced in developing object detection models, data analysis, and technology initiatives. Based in Berlin, Germany, with a focus on machine learning, computer vision, and generative AI.
profile.availability: Currently studying and working in Berlin

projects.title: Animal Identification - Mice Classification
projects.description: Machine learning model using YOLOv8 to distinguish between dotted and striped mice. Extracted and labeled image data from video, optimizing model performance through rigorous training.
highlights: Built high-performance model using Roboflow dataset from video frames
Achieved high accuracy for biological research applications
Advanced data preprocessing and augmentation techniques

projects.title: RahulAI Portfolio
projects.description: A personalized AI-powered portfolio website that showcases projects and skills through an interactive chat interface.
highlights: Interactive AI chat assistant with markdown support

experience.description: Developing object detection models and conducting R&D on real-time surveillance systems with AI integration.
achievements: Developed and trained custom object detection models using YOLO architecture
Conducted data collection and preprocessing for visual data from movie clips and trailers
Optimized model performance for accuracy and efficiency through analysis
Conducted literature reviews on state-of-the-art video object detection methods
Utilized Roboflow for data augmentation, labeling, and model management
Ongoing R&D on integrating real-time surveillance systems (ZoneMinder) with ML hooks

experience.description: Led cross-functional AI initiatives and technology projects, conducting market research and data analysis for B2C e-commerce operations.
achievements: Led cross-functional AI initiatives, partnering with academia to address client challenges
Conducted thorough market research to understand industry trends and competitive landscapes
Excelled in B2C e-commerce by applying data analysis to enhance operations
Demonstrated strong analytical skills in managing complex technical projects
Ensured successful execution of technology initiatives
